name: Quarries of Scred: Skin Pack #1
description:
Do you play Quarries of Scred? Do you like my pixel art? Do you like playing Quarries of Scred WITH my pixel art?! Well have I got something for you.

4 new sets for you to enjoy as you clear out those quarries made by me.

You even get a .txt file with instructions on how to install these beauties. ;D

Just in case you don't have the great game yet; you can grab Quarries of Scred from here

http://darkestkale.itch.io/quarries-of-scred

There is now a demopack with 3 of my free tilesets you can check out as well :)

**UPDATED TO SUPPORT Update 5**
